body.p: Louisville, Kentucky, hack driver and soldier. Kentucky native. Son of Alpheus B. Miller and Amanda Miller. Hack driver in Louisville in 1860. Enlisted as a private in 14th Kentucky Volunteer Infantry Regiment (U.S.A.) on October 15, 1861.
